title: Handle Return of a Gift
description: A customer wants to return a gift they received. They have a gift receipt.

tasks.expected_outcome: The POS retrieves the original transaction details but hides the price.
The system confirms the item was part of the gift purchase.

tasks.description: Process the return and issue the refund on a store credit/gift card, per store policy for gift returns.
tasks.expected_outcome: The gift recipient receives store credit for the value of the item.
